name: Crazy Ludo
description:
A mutation based on the classic flying chess! I hope that players can experience a different kind of fun!

The changes we made:
1. You no longer need to rush to the finish line! Regarding this change, we are very entangled in our hearts. We hope that users can transfer their goals from the end to other players and declare war on other players!
2. Make it more like fighting! Say goodbye to the traditional, when it surpasses other players' aircraft, it can send its aircraft back to the starting point. We can launch attacks on other players’ planes across several checkerboard grids!
3. Diversified airplanes and their exclusive features! You can form your favorite fleet instead of being the same aircraft model as others!
4. Not only grid jumping! We have added some "obstacles" to the board to add some instability to the battle between players!
